description: Question schema with categories and reference answers for evaluation

categories.name: easy
categories.description: Simple factual questions with clear answers

categories.name: medium_facts
categories.description: Questions requiring understanding of multiple facts

categories.name: medium_graphics
categories.description: Questions about visual elements and graphics

categories.name: hard_graphics
categories.description: Complex questions about visual details and layout

question_format.category: one of: easy, medium_facts, medium_graphics, hard_semantics, hard_graphics
question_format.question: the question text
question_format.answerable: boolean, true if answerable from the content

questions.question: What is the title of this document?
What were the two main revenue drivers mentioned?

system_prompt: Generate exactly 10 questions per source file following this category distribution: 2 easy, 2 medium_facts, 2 medium_graphics, 2 hard_semantics, 2 hard_graphics. Each question must have a reference_answer that can be verified against the original content.
